amendment.description: An amendment numbered 84 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule titled "Upholding Civil Service Protections and Merit System Principles.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 221 (Roll no. 636).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 221 (Roll no. 636).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
